ingredients.content: 7 oz garlic chives, cut into pieces (3 in.)
1 - 2 oz red chili peppers, thinly sliced, to taste
½ tsp soy sauce, to taste
¼ tsp ground white pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and sauté <b>3 min/212°F/speed <b>.
Add garlic chives, peppers, sugar, rice wine, soy sauce and white pepper and cook <b>3 min/250°F//speed 1<b>. Serve hot.
